scripts.start:gateway:dev: (pm2 delete nestjs-ujs-gateway 2>/dev/null || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=api-gateway -- pm2 start nest --name nestjs-ujs-gateway -- start -p ./src/api-gateway/tsconfig.json -w
scripts.start:user:dev: (pm2 delete nestjs-ujs-user 2>/dev/null || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=user -- pm2 start nest --name nestjs-ujs-user -- start -p ./src/microservice/user/tsconfig.json -w
scripts.start:system:dev: (pm2 delete nestjs-ujs-system 2>/dev/null || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=system -- pm2 start nest --name nestjs-ujs-system -- start -p ./src/microservice/system/tsconfig.json -w
scripts.start:content:dev: (pm2 delete nestjs-ujs-content 2>/dev/null || true) && dotenvx run --env APP_ENV=content -- pm2 start nest --name nestjs-ujs-content -- start -p ./src/microservice/content/tsconfig.json -w
scripts.start:dev: yarn docker:init && yarn start:system:dev && yarn start:user:dev && yarn start:content:dev && yarn start:gateway:dev && pm2 logs
scripts.api-gateway:prisma:generate: yarn user:prisma:generate && yarn system:prisma:generate && yarn content:prisma:generate
scripts.docker:mongodb:init: docker exec -it nestjs-ujs-mongodb-primary bash -c "dotenvx run -f /.env -- bash -c "/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sh""
scripts.docker:mongodb:dump: docker exec -it nestjs-ujs-mongodb-primary bash -c "dotenvx run -f /.env -- bash -c "/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/dump.sh"" && docker cp nestjs-ujs-mongodb-primary:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/data ./docker/mongodb
scripts.docker:remove: dotenvx run -f .env -- bash -c "docker rm -fv \$(docker ps -aq -f "name=\${APP_NAME}") 2>/dev/null | true"
scripts.docker:stop: dotenvx run -f .env -- bash -c "docker stop \$(docker ps -aq -f "name=\${APP_NAME}") 2>/dev/null | true"
scripts.pm2:destroy: rm -f ~/.pm2/logs/nestjs-ujs-*.log | pm2 list 2>/dev/null | grep 'nestjs-ujs' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r pm2 delete
